consent_header: If you are willing to participate in this study, please select the
appropriate responses using the form below.
consent_text: You will be given a copy of this consent form to keep and refer to
consent_q1: I agree that the research project named above has been explained to
me to my satisfaction in verbal and/or written form
consent_q2: I understand that if I decide at any other time during the research
that I no longer wish to participate in this project, I can notify
the researchers involved and be withdrawn from it immediately
consent_q3: I have read both the notes written above and the Information Sheet
about the project, and understand what the research study involves
consent_q4: I agree to take part in the study, which will include use of my
